title: From Tools to Teams: Unlocking Relevance AI’s Full Potential | Relevance AI

metadata.title: From Tools to Teams: Unlocking Relevance AI’s Full Potential | Relevance AI
metadata.description: Learn how the growth team at Verisoul unlocked the full potential of Relevance AI by moving from building simple tools to creating teams of AI agents triggered by automated workflows.
